milestones.name: Overpowering Presence
milestones.effect: You gain +2 to all contested checks involving Might or Presence.

milestones.name: Cleaving Blow
milestones.effect: When you deal Critical Damage with a Melee Attack, you restore 1 Presence.

milestones.name: Brute Force Reservoir
milestones.effect: Increases your Presence Resource Pool maximum by 3 and your HP gain doubles when targeting an enemy suffering a Stagger.
